gamePathPlaceholder: Please enter here your game path...
keepOpenDesc: Junimo will minimize into the system tray instead of closing when you click the close button in the main window.
activeRequirementDesc: Junimo will check for missing mod requirements on game start
blockRequirementDesc: Block Junimo from starting the game if any requirements are missing
activeBrokenDesc: Junimo will check for broken mods on game start
blockBrokenDesc: Block Junimo from starting the game if any mods are broken
apiPlaceholder: Please enter here your NexusMods API key...
nexusmodsNotAllowed: NexusMods login is not allowed in this version of Junimo
